Articles.Content:
So far, I have had ~100 flights, all of which are manned.

~15 flights have landed on Mun.

My Base (currently a bunch of random landers, four rovers and a communication base 3k from my main landing area) has ~30 Kerbals, commanded by Munbar Kermin.

Two flights are orbiting Kerbin (Satellite and the Anubis massive SSTO Space Plane [34m meters by 38m meters, with 6k units of fuel left])

I have somehow managed to keep every single Kerbin alive, although I can't find Jeb, Bill or Bob (may have ended their flight after landing )

I'm using a Gaming Laptop, and have launched up to 800 parts at a time...

Pictures coming later tonight..

Anyway...

Hello!
Good! Those are many flights! Upload some pictures!

Welcome to the community Windchild

Wow that's a lot of flights, and no casualties? Are you playing KSP right?

Looking forwards to those pics, fly safe!

I'm very lucky...

You'll see what I mean when I load the pictures (any help uploading?)

Edit: I found Jeb, Bill and Bob!!

Edited May 14, 2013 by Windchild
Photobucket and Imgur tend to be the two most common choices for image hosts around here. Check them out, and see which one works better for you.

Wow that's a lot of flights, and no casualties? Are you playing KSP right?

Everyone survived this:

Rest of my photographs will go up in a little bit...

Just preparing some story to go with them
Hi and welcome to the forums! That's no bad space program you have there, either! My Kerbals quake in fear whenever it's time to "test" a new design.

Here are the pictures and a small description.

Eventually, I plan on having it in a similar fashion to this thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/27552-Long-term-Laythe-Mission-%28pic-heavy%29-Now-with-%2A%2APART-5%2A%2A

My first Kerbin Base: made up of tests on a Mun Base...

All of this base's flights were ended to speed up launching (all Kerbals evacuated to the second base first)

My Second Kerbal Base: from plans made by Macey Dean for Laythe, edited for my Kerbal Base

- Commanded by Jebediah, Bill and Bob Kerman after successfully returning from Minmus (my only flight to Minmus and my farthest flight ever)

- Nearly at maximum capacity of 20 Kerbals

Launching the current Mun Command Module:

Mun Command Module on the Mun:

- the rover is from http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/26206-0-19-Dunebug-II-Duna-Return-separate-CM-Lander-Open-Top-Buggy-New-Design%21, as none of my designs have worked (yet)

- everything else is my design, most of which were to drop off cargo (I tried to launch six rovers to Mun... only 2 survived in usable state)

Mun Base:

My Mun Outlying Communication Base: also from plans made by Macey Dean for Laythe, edited for this Base

My Anubis flight's pictures are here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/26768-Anubis-Spaceplane-%28SSTO%29/page5
